description: A clean, modern, and futuristic UI design system for a 'Frequently Asked Questions' section. The design features a dark theme, a single-column layout, and interactive accordion elements styled with vibrant, glowing neon borders and dual-color text accents.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Deep navy/purple, used for the main background. Has a subtle noise/texture overlay.

secondary.name: accordion-background
secondary.description: A slightly lighter dark purple for the background of the accordion items.

accent-glow-primary.name: vibrant-purple-glow
accent-glow-primary.description: A bright, glowing purple used for the accordion borders and parts of the main title.

accent-glow-secondary.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: A vivid cyan used for parts of the main title and the 'collapse' icon.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for main headings and questions.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: A light grey for subtitles and the answer text within the accordion.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, a modern, geometric font like 'Poppins' or 'Exo 2'

layout.structure: A single-column, centered layout with a max-width for readability.

header.name: faq-header
header.description: The top section containing the main title and subtitles.

accordion-list.name: faq-container
accordion-list.description: The main container that holds the list of accordion items.

states.collapsed: Shows only the question and a plus icon.
states.expanded: Shows the question, answer, and a minus icon. The border glow might be more intense.

accordion-header.name: question-bar
accordion-header.description: The clickable header part of the accordion item.

accordion-content.name: answer-panel
accordion-content.description: The content area of the accordion that is revealed on expand.

toggle-icon.name: expand-collapse-icon
toggle-icon.description: The plus/minus icon indicating the accordion state.

background-texture.name: subtle-noise-overlay
background-texture.description: A subtle texture applied to the main background to add depth and a 'space' or 'digital' feel.
background-texture.style: A faint, dark noise or static pattern overlaying the primary background color.

page-divider.name: section-border-line
page-divider.description: The thin horizontal lines at the very top and bottom of the section.
